Data.Name: Circle
Data.Description: Players are placed in a circle spanning the map.

Data.Name: River
Data.Description: Allied players are placed on two parallel lines.

Data.Name: Grouped Lines
Data.Description: Allied players are placed along opposing radial lines.

Data.Name: Random Group
Data.Description: Allied players are grouped, but otherwise placed randomly on the map.

Data.Name: Stronghold
Data.Description: Allied players are tightly grouped together.
